about_the_game:
Have you ever heard of a 3D Indie First Person Idle Clicker Tycoon Economy Management Simulation game about printing Money?

Every doctor, health guru, parent and scientist in the world tells you to load up on greens for better life. I bet you didn't know they were talking about crisp dollar bills. So start printing money, for your health!

The coolest thing is that you can play Money Print Factory 3D Tycoon without playing it! After your machines are upgraded to Auto Mode, you can continue making money while you're away. And while you're away, money keeps building up, waiting for you to return and start spending!

Addictive gameplay for those who loves being a monopoly.

Buy new money makers, upgrade them, expand your state-of-the-art money printing empire and unlock new stuff to help you earn more money AND MORE MONEY $$$ !

💞ADD TO WISHLIST IF YOU LOVE MONEY💞
detailed_description:
Have you ever heard of a 3D Indie First Person Idle Clicker Tycoon Economy Management Simulation game about printing Money?

Every doctor, health guru, parent and scientist in the world tells you to load up on greens for better life. I bet you didn't know they were talking about crisp dollar bills. So start printing money, for your health!

The coolest thing is that you can play Money Print Factory 3D Tycoon without playing it! After your machines are upgraded to Auto Mode, you can continue making money while you're away. And while you're away, money keeps building up, waiting for you to return and start spending!

Addictive gameplay for those who loves being a monopoly.

Buy new money makers, upgrade them, expand your state-of-the-art money printing empire and unlock new stuff to help you earn more money AND MORE MONEY $$$ !

name: Money Print Factory 3D Tycoon💸

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 460 or Intel HD 630 (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core i7-3770 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 2060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 6600
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Greetings, our money hungry player. This is a 3D Clicker Tycoon game where your money making adventure begins. Print money, buy & upgrade machines, and expand your factory. Gain more money, and more money, AND MORE MONEY $$$!
supported_languages:
English, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
